utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You look cute in bubbles.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ehh, you're just liquored up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, it's me! I'm comin' in!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I've had a very long, hard day.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahh, I'm gonna go get some chicken. Want some?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, no thanks. No chicken, bye-bye then.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You sure? Some extra crispy? Dirty rice? Beans?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: For the last time no! Get out! Get out, Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you okay? I'm so sorry, he wouldn't leave. He kept asking me about chicken.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chicken? I could eat some chicken.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, can I get a 3-piece, some cole slaw, some beans, and a Coke-(Yelps in

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mornin' Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I have to tell you this story. Okay, I was coming over here and this driver…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Was his name Angus?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, he was this cab driver we had in London.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. Ha-ha-ha. All right, anyway…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, what that place, that pub he took us too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, The Wheatsheaf.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah-yeah, and they had that beer! That uh…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bodington's!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Bodington's! Woohoo!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh! Ahh, Pheebs, was gonna tell a story.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, so, he had a really funny hat—I don't want to talk about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Ross, Bodington's!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That was good beer.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know, I'd walk back to London for another frosty one of those bad boys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know, I think they have those at that British pub near the trade center.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Later!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Isn't Rachel supposed to be back by now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but her plane got delayed in Athens. But actually, she should be here by now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, so-so you talked to her. Did she, did she sound mad?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, but she likes me. You abandoned her on a plane to Greece.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I did not abandon Rachel! Okay? Emily showed up at the airport! I had to go after her! I mean, I-I did what I had to do! She's my wife! Rachel is my wife! Y'know—Emily! Emily, is my wife! Man, what is that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you still hadn't heard from Emily?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, not since I lost her at the airport.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe she can out run you man!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: HEY, SHE'S FAST!! OKAY?!! Oh! You-you think you can be beat me? Let's go! Outside!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, Rach, I am so sorry. I am so-so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross, come on! You just did what you had to do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's it? You're not mad? I mean, it must've been terrible.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Terrible? Hell, I was in Greece! That was a nice hotel! Nice beach, met the nice people. Not to shabby for Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, what? That's it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, yeah! We're cool. Totally cool.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thanks. Oh, you're the best.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, you're the best.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, I gotta go to the flower store! Check it out, no one will tell me where Emily is, so I'm gonna send 72 long-stem, red roses to Emily's parent's house, one for each day that I've known and loved her. That oughta get her talking to me again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, Ross, when you make out card; be sure to make it out to, EM-I-LY.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach, that's great! It's so good that you had a good time in Greece!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! I didn't have a good time in Greece! Ross abandoned me! Okay, I couldn't get a plane out, so I had to stay in their honeymoon suite with people coming up to me all the time going, "Oh, Mrs. Geller, why are you crying?" I mean, it was sooo humiliating. I felt like such an idiot! I mean, it's all my fault! And you know why, because I make very bad decisions.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that's not true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes it is! It is true! I went, I went after Ross in stupid London.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: London is stupid! Stupid!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, you were right. I should've never gone to London, and from now on you make all of my decisions for me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh… No, I did that for someone once and I'm not comfortable having that kind of power and control over someone's life.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll do it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's fine. So Monica, you are now in control of my love life.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I gotta go to work.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And uh, Rachel, glad to have you back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs! Always a pleasure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Rachel, sweetie, look, here's a really cute picture of Joey and you at the reception.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, he's married! Ross is married. I can't—I still can't believe it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, sweetie, by the edges.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean, y'know I'm just gonna have to accept it …

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …I mean it's my fault.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sweetie! Edges! Fingers! Smudgey! Pictures!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. That's okay. I-I know that you're very upset right now. I know, I know that wasn't about me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I bet it was about her a little.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If you would stop thinking about Ross for one minute you would notice that there are great guys everywhere! I mean, look! Look, Gunther! I mean, he's nice, he's cute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess Gunther is kinda…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, what about that guy over there? Remember? That is the guy you flirted with at the counter that time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know. I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're going to talk to him! Y'know what? We made a deal, I make your decisions and I say you're going to talk to him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, you're the boss. I guess I gotta do what you tell me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Say that to him and you're golden.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We got out pictures back from London. Here's all of us at the Tower of London.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Here we all are! Yeah, there's Ross and Joey and you and me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, y'know what, we've been talking about London too much haven't we?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. I'm sorry. It's just 'cause I couldn't be there. 'Cause all I ever get to do now is pregnant stuff, it just bums me out.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y'know, a little of this, a little of that. Got myself a date tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See, didn't I tell you?! You're getting over Ross already!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well…

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Get out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What took you so long?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I got caught up and work, but I'm quitting tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, thanks for having me over! Rach. Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See ya!! What the hell was that?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Probably some y'know, European good-bye thing he picked up in London.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's not European!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it felt French.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, I really had a good time!

utterance.speaker: Dave
utterance.content: Yeah, me too. So, I guess this is it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Umm, unless you wanna come inside?

utterance.speaker: Dave
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Oh, uh, wait a minute, y'know what? I uh, I can't decide this. Umm, okay, just hold on a second.

utterance.speaker: Dave
utterance.content: Okay, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is Monica around? I-I have to ask her something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She's doing her laundry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It came in the mail today, it's uh, 72 long-stemmed red roses, one for each day that I've known and loved Emily, cut up into mulch!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, honey that's awful.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, it's not so bad. Monica's gonna make potpourri! I think I'm gonna go wander out in the rain for a while.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But, it's not raining.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't catch a break!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know what Ross? You're not going anywhere. You're gonna sit right here. I'm gonna make you a cup of tea and we're gonna talk this thing whole out. All right? Hey, Dave!

utterance.speaker: Dave
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, listen, I'm gonna need to take a rain check, my roommate is just really sick. Okay? Bye! Honey, listen, I know, I know things seem so bad right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach? Can I talk to for just a minute? I-I dropped some socks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is the matter with you?! Do you want to fall into the trap? Do you want to fall into the trap?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! You did not drop any socks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just ran into Dave and he told me that you blew him off! I mean, you listen to me! Now, I'm calling the shots! I say you leave Ross alone and go get Dave! What the hell were you trying to do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, ultimately, I was trying y'know, I-I wanted…tell him y'know, that I'm still in love with him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!! You cannot tell him that!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why? Why not?! People love to hear that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I make the decisions, and I say no.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y'know what, no, you do not make my decisions because y'know what, you're fired.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can't fire me. I make your decisions and I say, "I'm not fired!" Ha!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel!! Come on! Let me in!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Havin' some trouble?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel locked the door.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll kick that door in if you give me a little sugar.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel! Let me in! Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you. Rachel, can I talk to you outside for a sec?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I really need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, then talk!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I will. Remember that thing that we just discussed that you wanted to do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What thing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, Rachel wants to take swing dance lessons. Which I think is a really stupid idea! It's dangerous, she's never gonna get what she wants, and who knows who she might end up hurting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica's right, swing dancing can be tricky. I'm gonna use the phone. I gotta cancel those five giant teddy bears I sent to Emily. My God, think of the massacre.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm gonna do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, Rachel, I know-I know you think I'm crazy, please, before you tell him you love him, just-just try to find one person who thinks this is a good idea. Because I bet you, you can't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, I'm in!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Good deal.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Pheebs! Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, okay, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, y'know how the other day you were talking about how you didn't get to go to London and how you were kinda feeling left out?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, well, we felt really bad about that so we decided we should all take a little trip together!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, that's so nice! How great! Well, where? Where's the trip?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, we thought we would all go to a picnic , in Central Park!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Central… Park!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, all of us! All day!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That sucks! That's not a trip! I just came from the park! What are we gonna high five about at the stupid Central Park? "Well, it's right by my house, all right!"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I'm gonna go home and bask in the triumph of my Central Park idea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey-whoa-whoa-whoa!! Ho-ho-hold on a sec there, Mr. Kissey! Y'know, I've been meaning to talk to you about this whole, little, new European thing you got going on, and I just need to tell you that it makes me very uncomfortable and I just—y'know—stop it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was just trying to bring a little culture to the group.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's fine, just don't bring it in my mouth.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Makes me wanna puke!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey everybody, Pheebs is here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, woo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, woo! Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, Pheebs, we decided the picnic idea was a little… Y'know, it didn't have any… It-it, well it blew. So, we thought, that this afternoon that we would all go away for the whole weekend to, Atlantic City!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, Atlantic City! Oh, that's a great plan! Who's plan was that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait! It was my plan.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nooo, I said we needed a new plan.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And, I came up with Atlantic City.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Which, is the new plan!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, well, why don't we all meet upstairs in an hour?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Ooh-ahh, I'm gonna go pack. I'm gonna go pack my ass off!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on Rach, let's go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know what? I'm-I'm gonna meet you upstairs in a minute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Rachel, you didn't find anyone so you can't tell him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y'know what, that doesn't matter.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, Rachel, do you have any idea how painful it is to tell someone that you love them and not have them say it back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I don't care.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. I-I can't watch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What 'cha readin'?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The paper.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, what's it about?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Events from around the globe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Uhh, Ross, y'know what, there's something that I-that I have to talk to you about and everybody's saying that I shouldn't tell you, but I think they're wrong. I mean, and you know how people can be wrong.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure. Once, at work I-I thought carbon dating was fossilized…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, Ross, I'm really trying to tell you something here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, okay, I think I'm-I'm just gonna-just gonna say it. Just gonna say it. Uhh, I'm still in love with you Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow. Umm… Huh… I'm-I'm not sure what to do with that right now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What? Was that a joke? 'Cause it's mean.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm so dead serious. I'm totally serious.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why are you laughing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because , because, I just heard it. I heard it, and it's ridiculous! I mean, you're married. You're-you're married and it's just ridiculous, and it's like, it's like when said it, I sort of like, I floated up out of my body, y'know? And, and-and then I heard myself say it and then the floating Rachel was like, "You are such an idiot!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, well I am married. Even though I haven't spoken to my wife since the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry, that's not funny.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, it kinda is. My wife won't return my calls. I don't know where my wife is. "Hey Ross, where's the Mrs.?" Don't know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, ohh, okay, y'know what, do you think ah, do you think that you just forget that I told you this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I kinda half to. I mean, because the thing is…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The thing is y'know, that you're married to Emily.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That is what the thing is.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, things aren't gonna be weird between us, right? I mean was that just the stupidest thing, me telling you that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No. No, I'm-I'm glad you did. Look, if nothing else, it's-it's always great when someone tells you they love you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's what I said! Thank you for being so nice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No thank you for… Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, let's go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Atlantic City!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Atlantic City, baby! Let's roll some bones! Hey Joey, high-five for rolling bones!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, Pheebs, you're leaking?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! You're water broke!

utterance.speaker: The Guys
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. Well, don't worry, I call shotgun!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! Wait-wait!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs! We have to take you to the hospital now!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs, Pheebs, the babies are coming now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: High-five, the babies are coming!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait, wait, remember when my water broke?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe Phoebe's gonna have her babies!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, it's beautiful. Amazing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what else I can't believe? I had to kiss Phoebe and Rachel every time I left a room, I mean it's too bad they didn't see us having sex.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you know anything about women?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's all right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.
